eZ.Plugin.ConfirmBox.name: eZ.Plugin.ConfirmBox
eZ.Plugin.ConfirmBox.description:
The confirm box plugin. It's a plugin the application to set up the
`confirmBoxOpen` and `confirmBoxClose` event handlers.

eZ.Plugin.DomState.name: eZ.Plugin.DomState
eZ.Plugin.DomState.description:
DOM State plugin. Reflects the application state in the DOM by setting
some classes depending on the events.

eZ.Plugin.LanguageSelectionBox.name: eZ.Plugin.LanguageSelectionBox
eZ.Plugin.LanguageSelectionBox.description:
The language selection box plugin. It's a plugin the application to set up the
`languageSelect`, `languageSelected` and `cancelLanguageSelection` event handlers.

eZ.Plugin.NotificationHub.name: eZ.Plugin.NotificationHub
eZ.Plugin.NotificationHub.description:
The notification hub plugin for the application. It is responsible for
catching the `notify` events and to give the corresponding notification
to the notification hub view service.

eZ.Plugin.Position.name: eZ.Plugin.Position
eZ.Plugin.Position.description:
The position plugin is responsible for handling the `heightChange` events
to adjust the margin of the main views node so that the navigation hub
and notification hub views don't overlap the main views. It also informs
the active view of its new position when a heightChange event is caught.

eZ.Plugin.RegisterLanguageHelpers.name: eZ.Plugin.RegisterLanguageHelpers
eZ.Plugin.RegisterLanguageHelpers.description:
Register Language Helpers plugin for the Platform UI application. It registers
handlebars helper allowing to get language name based on language code:

  * `language_name` is for returning language name based on given language code. It takes the
  language code as an argument

eZ.Plugin.RegisterUrlHelpers.name: eZ.Plugin.RegisterUrlHelpers
eZ.Plugin.RegisterUrlHelpers.description:
Register Url Helpers plugin for the Platform UI application. It registers
two handlebars helpers to deal with the url:

  * `path` is meant to build link to application routes. It takes the
  name of a route and the expected route parameters as a literal object
  * `asset` is meant to build url to a static file provided by the
  PlatformUIBundle (typically an image)

eZ.Plugin.DiscoveryWidget.name: eZ.Plugin.DiscoveryWidget
eZ.Plugin.DiscoveryWidget.description:
Universal discovery plugin. It connects the PlatformUI app and the
universal discovery widget by setting the event handlers for the
`contentDiscover`, `contentDiscovered` and `cancelDiscover` events.
By triggering those events, any component can control the universal
discovery widget.

eZ.Plugin.UpdateTree.name: eZ.Plugin.UpdateTree
eZ.Plugin.UpdateTree.description:
The update tree plugin for the application. It will update the discoveryBar tree
after catching an associated event. Events can be send by actions like DELETE/MOVE/COPY/EDIT/CREATE

eZ.AuthorInputView.name: eZ.AuthorInputView
eZ.AuthorInputView.description:
Internal author input view. The author input views are responsible for
handling one author.

eZ.BinaryBaseEditView.name: eZ.BinaryBaseEditView
eZ.BinaryBaseEditView.description: The BinaryBase field edit view. This class is meant to be extended.

eZ.RichTextView.name: eZ.RichTextView
eZ.RichTextView.description: The field view to display RichText fields

eZ.SelectionEditView.name: eZ.SelectionEditView
eZ.SelectionEditView.description:
Selection edit view. It uses the SelectionFilterView to provide a rich UI
to help selecting one or several items over a long list.

eZ.NavigationItemParameterView.name: eZ.NavigationItemParameterView
eZ.NavigationItemParameterView.description:
The navigation item parameter view. It can be used when the associated
route is generic route and the matching needs to take a parameter into
account.

eZ.NavigationItemSubtreeView.name: eZ.NavigationItemSubtreeView
eZ.NavigationItemSubtreeView.description:
The navigation item subtree view. It can be used to represent a
navigation item pointing to a location in the location tree.

eZ.NavigationItemView.name: eZ.NavigationItemView
eZ.NavigationItemView.description:
The navigation item view. It represents a navigation item to be
rendered in the navigation of a zone.

eZ.ContentTypeEditServerSideView.name: eZ.ContentTypeEditServerSideView
eZ.ContentTypeEditServerSideView.description: The content type server side view.

eZ.RoleServerSideView.name: eZ.RoleServerSideView
eZ.RoleServerSideView.description:
The role server side view. It adds the handling of the role assign
button.

eZ.SectionServerSideView.name: eZ.SectionServerSideView
eZ.SectionServerSideView.description:
The section server side view. It adds the handling of the section assign
button.

eZ.Plugin.ContentSetMainLocation.name: eZ.Plugin.ContentSetMainLocation
eZ.Plugin.ContentSetMainLocation.description:
Set main location plugin. It sets an event handler to set the given location as
main location of given content.

In order to use it you need to fire `setMainLocation` event with parameter
`locationId` containing the location id which will be set as main location of content.

eZ.Plugin.ContentTree.name: eZ.Plugin.ContentTree
eZ.Plugin.ContentTree.description:
Base Content Tree Plugin. This class provides the methods to handle a
lazy loaded content tree and is meant to be extended.

eZ.Plugin.CopyContent.name: eZ.Plugin.CopyContent
eZ.Plugin.CopyContent.description:
CopyContentPlugin fires the universal discovery widget to copy
a content under the selected location, on copyAction event.

eZ.Plugin.DiscardDraft.name: eZ.Plugin.DiscardDraft
eZ.Plugin.DiscardDraft.description:
Discard draft plugin. It discards the draft when the discardAction is
triggered.

eZ.Plugin.DiscoveryBarContentTree.name: eZ.Plugin.DiscoveryBarContentTree
eZ.Plugin.DiscoveryBarContentTree.description:
Discovery Bar Content Tree Plugin. It enhances the discovery bar to
handle the content tree related events and fetching.

eZ.Plugin.ImageVariationLoad.name: eZ.Plugin.ImageVariationLoad
eZ.Plugin.ImageVariationLoad.description:
Image variation load plugin. It sets an event handler on the
loadImageVariation event to load an image variation

eZ.Plugin.LocationCreate.name: eZ.Plugin.LocationCreate
eZ.Plugin.LocationCreate.description:
Create location plugin. It sets an event handler to create location
for given content.

In order to use it you need to fire `createLocation` event with parameter
`content` containing the eZ.Content object for which you want to create location.

eZ.Plugin.LocationRemove.name: eZ.Plugin.LocationRemove
eZ.Plugin.LocationRemove.description:
Remove locations plugin. It sets an event handler to remove locations.

In order to use it you need to fire `removeLocations` event with parameter
`locations` containing the array with eZ.Location objects that will be removed.

eZ.Plugin.LocationsLoad.name: eZ.Plugin.LocationsLoad
eZ.Plugin.LocationsLoad.description:
Object locations load plugin. It sets an event handler to load locations
of content for locations tab in location view.

In order to use it you need to fire `loadLocations` event with parameter
`content` containing the eZ.Content object for which you want to load locations.

eZ.Plugin.LoginAvailable.name: eZ.Plugin.LoginAvailable
eZ.Plugin.LoginAvailable.description:
Login available plugin. It sets an event handler to check if a login is
available.

eZ.Plugin.ObjectRelationLoad.name: eZ.Plugin.ObjectRelationLoad
eZ.Plugin.ObjectRelationLoad.description:
Object relation load plugin. It sets an event handler to load a content
in an object relation field.

eZ.Plugin.ObjectRelationsLoad.name: eZ.Plugin.ObjectRelationsLoad
eZ.Plugin.ObjectRelationsLoad.description: Object relations load plugin. It sets an event handler to load related contents.

eZ.Plugin.PublishDraft.name: eZ.Plugin.PublishDraft
eZ.Plugin.PublishDraft.description:
Publish draft plugin. It publishes the version hold by the host object (a
service) when the publishAction event is triggered.

eZ.Plugin.SaveDraft.name: eZ.Plugin.SaveDraft
eZ.Plugin.SaveDraft.description:
Save draft plugin. It saves the draft when the `saveAction` event is
triggered.

eZ.Plugin.Search.name: eZ.Plugin.Search
eZ.Plugin.Search.description:
Search plugin. It listens to `locationSearch` and `contentSearch` events
and execute the corresponding search.

eZ.Plugin.UniversalDiscoveryContentTree.name: eZ.Plugin.UniversalDiscoveryContentTree
eZ.Plugin.UniversalDiscoveryContentTree.description:
Universal Discovery Content Tree Plugin. It enhances the universal
discovery to handle the content tree related events and fetching.

eZ.Plugin.UserLoad.name: eZ.Plugin.UserLoad
eZ.Plugin.UserLoad.description:
Object user load plugin. It sets an event handler to load contents
in an object relation list field.

In order to use it you need to fire the `loadUser` event with two parameters:
 - `userId` of the user to be loaded
 - `attributeName` where to store the result

eZ.Plugin.ViewServiceBase.name: eZ.Plugin.ViewServiceBase
eZ.Plugin.ViewServiceBase.description:
View Service Base Plugin class. This class is meant to be extended to
create view service plugins. It defines 3 public methods you can override
at will to enrich the behavior of a view service. In addition, it's
common to add an `initializer` method where you can setup custom event
handlers and you **must** define a `NS` static property.

After creating the class, don't forget to register the plugin in the
eZ.PluginRegistry.

eZ.Plugin.VisibilitySwitcherPlugin.name: eZ.Plugin.VisibilitySwitcherPlugin
eZ.Plugin.VisibilitySwitcherPlugin.description:
Location visibility switcher plugin. It sets an event handler to update the
visibility of a location

In order to use it you need to fire the `switchVisibility` event with two parameters:
 - `location` to be modified
 - `callback` to be called once done

eZ.ContentCreateViewService.name: eZ.ContentCreateViewService
eZ.ContentCreateViewService.description:
Content create view service.

It initializes the models to use while creating a content.

eZ.ContentEditViewService.name: eZ.ContentEditViewService
eZ.ContentEditViewService.description:
Content edit view service.

Loads the models needed by the content edit view

eZ.LanguageSelectionBoxViewService.name: eZ.LanguageSelectionBoxViewService
eZ.LanguageSelectionBoxViewService.description: The language selection box view service

eZ.LocationViewViewService.name: eZ.LocationViewViewService
eZ.LocationViewViewService.description:
Location view view service.

Loads the models needed by the location view

eZ.NotificationHubViewService.name: eZ.NotificationHubViewService
eZ.NotificationHubViewService.description:
The notification hub view service. It is responsible for adding or
updating the notifications in the notification list.

eZ.RoleServerSideViewService.name: eZ.RoleServerSideViewService
eZ.RoleServerSideViewService.description: The Role Server Side View Service class.

eZ.SectionServerSideViewService.name: eZ.SectionServerSideViewService
eZ.SectionServerSideViewService.description: The Section Server Side View Service class.

eZ.ServerSideViewService.name: eZ.ServerSideViewService
eZ.ServerSideViewService.description:
The Server Side View Service class. It is meant to be used to load the
content of a server side view.

eZ.TrashViewService.name: eZ.TrashViewService
eZ.TrashViewService.description:
Trash view service.

Loads the trash items needed by the trash view

eZ.UniversalDiscoveryViewService.name: eZ.UniversalDiscoveryViewService
eZ.UniversalDiscoveryViewService.description:
View service for the universal discovery widget. It only provides the
configuration to the universal discovery view.

eZ.ViewService.name: eZ.ViewService
eZ.ViewService.description:
View service base class.
The classes extending this one are supposed to be used in the route
definition, see {{#crossLink "eZ.PlatformUIApp"}}the route
attribute of eZ.PlatformUIApp{{/crossLink}}

eZ.SubitemBaseView.name: eZ.SubitemBaseView
eZ.SubitemBaseView.description: The subitem base view. It's the base class for the subitem list views.

eZ.SubitemGridItemView.name: eZ.SubitemGridItemView
eZ.SubitemGridItemView.description:
The subitem grid item view. Note: This component is **private** as this
part will shortly change and will be replaced by the concept of content
cards.

eZ.LocationViewDetailsTabView.name: eZ.LocationViewDetailsTabView
eZ.LocationViewDetailsTabView.description: The Location View View Details tab class.

eZ.SelectionFilterView.name: eZ.SelectionFilterView

A view allowing to select one or several items amongst a list and to filter the list by typing some text in an input field. It is based on YUI AutoCompleteBase component. This view is meant to progressively enhance an existing markup:

eZ.AccordionElement.name: eZ.AccordionElement

eZ.AsynchronousView.name: eZ.AsynchronousView
eZ.AsynchronousView.description:
Views extension providing the concept of asynchronously rendered view.
An asynchronous view is first rendered in a *loading state*, then fires
an event to get the missing data and when it gets them, it is rerendered.
The loading errors are also handled and such a view can also have a
*retry* button. When a view is extended with this extension, its
initializer method should set the required properties `_fireMethod` and
optionally:
* the `_watchAttribute` to subscribe to the corresponding change event.
* the `_errorHandlingMethod` to customize the error handling, otherwise
the view is just rerendered in case of error

eZ.Expandable.name: eZ.Expandable
eZ.Expandable.description:

eZ.HeightChange.name: eZ.HeightChange

eZ.HeightFit.name: eZ.HeightFit
eZ.HeightFit.description:

eZ.Processable.name: eZ.Processable
eZ.Processable.description:
View extension providing the concept of processor. The processors are

eZ.SelectionTable.name: eZ.SelectionTable
eZ.SelectionTable.description:
Extension for the views providing a table that is meant to select some items and to enable one or several buttons depending on the selection. This extensions expects the following markup to work correctly:
When a ez-selection-table-checkbox checkbox is checked, its ez-selection-table-row ancestor gets the is-row-selected class and if there's at least one checked checkbox, the buttons that match the selector in the data-selection-buttons attribute are enabled.

eZ.SideViewService.name: eZ.SideViewService
eZ.SideViewService.description:

Basically a side view service can be configured with parameters just for
one execution.

eZ.Tabs.name: eZ.Tabs
eZ.Tabs.description:
Extension providing the `_selectTab` method which allows to handle a
tab based interface. By default, it sets a tap event handler
on '.ez-tabs .ez-tabs-label a' to switch from a tab to another.

classitems.description:
Stores the available routes for the application.

In addition to what is described in the {{#crossLink "App"}}YUI
App documentation{{/crossLink}}, each route can have several
metadata (all optional):

  * `service`: contains a reference to a constructor function that
    extends {{#crossLink "eZ.ViewService"}}eZ.ViewService{{/crossLink}}.
    The {{#crossLink "eZ.PlatformUIApp/handleMainView:method"}}`handleMainView`{{/crossLink}}
    middleware is responsible for using this function to build the
    view service which can be used to inject custom variables in the
    top level view triggered by the route. This view service is
    also made a bubble target of the view so that it can react to
    any custom event fired by the view.
  * `name`: name of the route which is useful to generate an URI
    with {{#crossLink
    "eZ.PlatformUIApp/routeUri:method"}}Y.eZ.PlatformUIApp.routeUri{{/crossLink}}
  * `view`: the identifier of the view in the `views` hash to
    display. This is handled by the `handleMainView` middleware.
  * `sideViews`: a hash which keys are the side view keys in the
    sideViews property. A truthy value means that the
    corresponding side view should be visible, false means that
    the side view should be explicitely hidden. If a side view is
    not mentionned it means it should remain as it is.

If a route provides both a `regex` and a `path` properties, the
`regex` is used in the route matching process, while the `path`
can be used in the reverse routing process (generation of a
link). If no `path` is provided, no reverse routing is possible.
classitems.name: routes

Parses the hash returned by the eZ Publish REST API

classitems.name: parse

params.description:
an object with a `document` property holding
the struct to parse like the response object from the eZ JS REST
Client

classitems.description:
Loads the model from a simple literal object. It applies
the mapping described by the ATTRS_REST_MAP and LINKS_MAP.
classitems.name: loadFromHash

classitems.description:
Overrides the default implementation to make sure the id is also
resetted to its default value (null) when necessary.
It's a workaround for https://github.com/yui/yui3/issues/1982 which
causes https://jira.ez.no/browse/EZP-23584
classitems.name: reset

params.name: name
params.description:
The name of the attribute to reset. If
omitted, all attributes are reset.

return.description: A reference to the host object.

classitems.description:
Overrides the default implementation to make sure the models in
attributes are also jsonified.
classitems.name: toJSON

classitems.description:
Root element in the REST API response where the data is located.
It can contains points to target a deep structure.
classitems.name: REST_STRUCT_ROOT

classitems.description:
Mapping between properties in a hash structure
and the attributes of the model object. Each element can be
a string or a hash with one pair key/value.
A string means a simple mapping between the rest structure
property and the attribute. The simple hash allows to have
a different attribute identifier than the property name.
Example:

    // REST structure
    {"name": "my name", "id": 42}

With the following map:

    ["name", {'id': 'myId'}]

Would result in the following hash:

    {"name": "my name", "myId": 42}

when parsed in the _parseStruct method.
classitems.name: ATTRS_REST_MAP

classitems.description:
Array of linked resources to parse and make available
in the resources attribute
Example:

    ['Owner', 'MainLocation']
classitems.name: LINKS_MAP
resources
